last_episode_to_air.name: Turnip Day
last_episode_to_air.overview: Digby must overcome his fear of turnips to ensure that the right person wins a turnip-carving contest.

name: Digby Dragon
overview: A dragon and his pals have amazing adventures.

episodes.name: Dragon Day
episodes.overview: Every year Digby feels down on Dragon Day. After all, how can he enjoy the celebrations when he, a dragon, can't fly or breathe fire?

episodes.name: Dragon Rock
episodes.overview: When Digby tells his friends that they need to go to Peek Rock to see a special event, Grizel and Mungo decide they have to get there first.

episodes.name: Fishing Chips
episodes.overview: When Chips catches a shell in his fishing net, he's certain he's actually found a Sea Nut. He's determined to keep it - until the shell starts travelling around by itself.

episodes.name: Grumpy's Little Brother
episodes.overview: Fizzy is convinced she has turned Grumpy into a giant - which is terrible news - as his "Little" Brother is due to come to tea that very day!

episodes.name: Runaway Scottie
episodes.overview: When Mungo accidentally starts up Scottie with Archie on board, Digby realises that he has the chance to be a hero. Saving Scottie and Archie is far harder than he imagined!

episodes.name: Every Cloud Has a Grumpy Lining
episodes.overview: When Fizzy tries to water her thirsty apple tree, the raincloud she creates only succeeds in trapping her, Digby and Chips high up in the sky. Only Grumpy can save them...

episodes.name: The Snail Trail
episodes.overview: On a wet summer morning, three snails try to make themselves at home at Grumpy's. He is NOT pleased. When Grizel and Mungo try to take the snails he has a change of heart.

episodes.name: A Good Fairy
episodes.overview: Spellbook insists that Fizzy learns how good fairies are attentive to other characters' needs. Fizzy tries to make life better for her friends. However she only succeeds in making things a lot worse.

episodes.name: Digby No Dragon
episodes.overview: Digby decides he's no good at being a dragon. He decides to try being a fairy, a goblin and a squirrel instead and discovers his inner dragon in the process.

episodes.name: The Great Nut Hunt
episodes.overview: Chips always wins the Great Nut Hunt- but when Grizel finds the map showing where all the hidden nuts are, she joins in the game too!

episodes.name: Picture This
episodes.overview: Fizzy tries to deliver a Picture to Digby. How difficult could that be?

episodes.name: Firework Night
episodes.overview: When Digby discovers that the weather is going to hide the Northern Lights, Albert and Archie lay on a Firework display instead... Will Digby get to the display on time when his friends are so slow getting ready?

episodes.name: Mud Monster
episodes.overview: When Chips loses Digby's favourite kite in the swamp, his friends are reluctant to help him get it back... Isn't there a monster in the swamp?

episodes.name: Stealing Colour
episodes.overview: Fizzy has a Special Container that can make things and characters change colour. Digby is delighted as he can now turn the same colour as his hero Red Rufus. However, when Grizel and Mungo manage to get their hands on it, the container takes all the colour OUT of Applecross...

episodes.name: Wings
episodes.overview: Digby accidentally lets out a pair of Fizzy's wings. He tries to get them back without her finding out.

episodes.name: Mungo's Rope Trick
episodes.overview: Grizel falls into a trap she was making for Digby and can't climb out. Mungo must get some rope from Digby and his friends, without letting them know why he needs it...

episodes.name: The Great Race
episodes.overview: All of Digby's pals have won the Great Soapbox Race before, but Digby has only ever come second. He competes with Grizel for his first ever victory.

episodes.name: Double Dragon
episodes.overview: Grizel finds a way to disguise herself as Digby and then proceeds to torment his friends - who cannot believe that he is behaving so badly!

episodes.name: Monster in the Dark
episodes.overview: Digby reads the story of Black McKracken to Sprite - and then hears a McKracken-like noise outside. Could it be that Red Rufus' arch enemy is here in Applecross?

episodes.name: Uphill
episodes.overview: Grumpy is carrying a mysterious box up to the highest hill in Applecross. Digby and Chips do their very best to help.

episodes.name: The Disappearing Spell
episodes.overview: Fizzy casts a disappearing spell on Sprite. When Grizel and Mungo take Spellbook, it seems impossible to magic Sprite back again.

episodes.name: Archie's Superbike
episodes.overview: Archie is so busy, he thinks it would be a good idea to soup up his bike. However, Digby's engineering work sends the bike and its rider on a chaotic journey around Applecross Wood.

episodes.name: A Snowy Invitation
episodes.overview: Albert's trusty barometer predicts snowstorms over in Grizel's neck of the woods. Digby is determined that Grizel and Mungo enjoy Christmas with him and his friends. Unfortunately no one else seems very keen on the idea...

episodes.name: Applecrossmass
episodes.overview: After saving Grizel and Mungo from being isolated in the winter snow, Digby and his friends try to let their new guests help in preparing for the festival and feast. Despite being keen to participate for once, Grizel's attempts at assisting grumpy and the other goes badly wrong.

episodes.name: Bristles
episodes.overview: When trying to help Digby clean up his cave, Fizzy accidentally turns a brush into a puppy-like pet. She desperately wants to keep it, despite the fact the 'pet' starts getting far too big to control.

episodes.name: Stickpine
episodes.overview: Digby invents a new game. It involves a stick, a round cone and 18 holes.

episodes.name: Digby's Store
episodes.overview: Digby is frustrated that his friends cannot buy anything from Albert's shop, so he opens his own store.

episodes.name: The Nut Barrel
episodes.overview: Taking some nuts in a barrel up to Chips's Treehouse is an easy task for a smart goblin and an intrepid dragon, surely. Surely?

episodes.name: Mungo's Flight School
episodes.overview: Mungo crashes and forgets how to fly, so Digby resolves to teach him how to take to the skies again.

episodes.name: Growing Pains
episodes.overview: Digby has discovered that he has not grown all year. He is persuaded by Fizzy to try one of her simple growing spells.

episodes.name: Mushrooming Mushrooms
episodes.overview: Fizzy leaves Digby and Chips looking after a magic potion while she goes to find the final ingredient. However, their potion-sitting brings disastrous results!

episodes.name: Nut Club
episodes.overview: Chips is ejected from The Train Club by Grumpy. He finds an unlikely ally in Grizel, who invites her into her Nut Club. Only too late does Chips realise why he's asked to join.

episodes.name: Detective Digby
episodes.overview: Unusual items are being taken from all over Applecross. Digby decides to track down the mysterious taker... But everyone seems to be a victim, so who could it be?

episodes.name: Walking in a Sleepy Slumberland
episodes.overview: Someone is taking items from Digby and his friends in the middle of the night. Everyone has a sleepover at Fizzy's to discover who this someone is!

episodes.name: Nuts About Magic
episodes.overview: When Spellbrook and Fizzy have a row about being a good fairy, Spellbrook makes the mistake of taking Chips on as her new apprentice!

episodes.name: Foggy Fracas
episodes.overview: Digby has a direction finder he's desperate to try out. A sudden Fog-fall gives him the chance to use his new device. Unfortunately, Grizel wants to play with it too!

episodes.name: Dragon Magic
episodes.overview: Digby thinks Fizzy will be delighted by the box of tricks he found at Albert's store. Fizzy scoffs at this play magic and tries to show him how much better real magic is.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home
episodes.overview: Grizel is tired of staying in her windswet and freezing home. She decides to frighten Fizzy out of her Mushroom Cottage so she can stay there instead.

episodes.name: Superfast Dragon Coaster
episodes.overview: Mungo helps Grizel clear up their home and finds the perfect place to deposit their junk - in Chips's treehouse.

episodes.name: Wonder Wings
episodes.overview: Inspired by a Red Rufus tale of super-heroics, Digby decides to become Wonderwings, the guardian of Applecross. Now, who should be his faithful sidekick?

episodes.name: Not a Drop to Drink
episodes.overview: When there is a water shortage, Fizzy's plants wither and die. In search of the cause of the drought, Digby and Chips come across the dried up river. At the river they discover a trail which they follow.

episodes.name: Fizzy's Wand
episodes.overview: When Fizzy's wand breaks just before she's about to set off for Fairy Camp, Digby decides to go on a quest to find an old Goblin Wand hidden somewhere in Applecross.

episodes.name: Caught on Camera
episodes.overview: When Fizzy finds an old magical camera in a dusty cupboard she starts using it. Only the camera doesn't just take pictures.

episodes.name: Wide Awake Over
episodes.overview: It's the Summer Solstice and Digby and Chips want to be up to see it dawn. Only Chips cannot get to sleep.

episodes.name: Cousin Dougie
episodes.overview: Digby's cousin, Dougie, drops in on Applecross. It eventually becomes clear that Dougie's stories are far too good to be true.

episodes.name: Swapping Stone
episodes.overview: When Chips and Grumpy get caught up in one of Fizzy's spells, they swap characters, much to everyone's surprise.

episodes.name: Grumpy's Great Invention
episodes.overview: Grumpy tries to build some mechanical legs in order to win the Goblin Invention Fair. Can he get it built in time and save Albert who's trapped in his shop?

episodes.name: Apple Fool's Day
episodes.overview: Digby's brilliant at playing tricks on his friends on Apple Fool's Day. Will they be able to trick him in return?

episodes.name: Spelling Test
episodes.overview: Fizzy is having a spelling test with Spellbook today, so Digby and Chips decide to give her a little help.

episodes.name: Safety Squirrel
episodes.overview: When Chips causes mayhem in Applecross for the umpteenth time, he decides to change his way and become the Safety Officer for the wood.

episodes.name: Star Wishes
episodes.overview: Everyone in Applecross is searching for a Fallen Star. Everyone except Mungo, who doesn't realise that that the star fell on him.

episodes.name: Applecross Games
episodes.overview: Digby's sure he'll be best at all the events at the Applecross Games. It's soon clear he's not as brilliant as expected.

episodes.name: Stinky Goblin Cheese
episodes.overview: Digby needs to find Spellbook's missing page so that Fizzy can complete a spell and stop Grumpy's stinky cheese running amok around Applecross.

episodes.name: Wobbly Horn
episodes.overview: Digby gets his first dragon horn. It's rather wobbly and he doesn't want his friends to know in case they think that only having one horn makes him less of a dragon.

episodes.name: Chips's Gift
episodes.overview: Chips makes a statue of Digby for a gift, but Digby thinks that it is really ugly and tries to get rid of it.

episodes.name: Shrinky Dragon
episodes.overview: Digby and Archie end up tiny after getting caught up in a magic spell gone awry. Can they find the way to Fizzy's cottage for the spell to be reversed before they get squished?

episodes.name: Smart Mungo
episodes.overview: When Digby decides to use magic to make Mungo more intelligent, Mungo ends up a genius and starts causing trouble.

episodes.name: Fairy Flu
episodes.overview: Digby insists on Fizzy accompanying him to the annual Sprite Flight, despite her having a bad case of fairy flu. Her magical sneezes almost ruin everything.

episodes.name: Cuddlenut
episodes.overview: When Digby loses Chips's favourite toy but doesn't want to admit it, he gets Fizzy to cast a spell to help Chips sleep without it. The spell accidentally turns Chips into a baby!

episodes.name: Wishing Cave
episodes.overview: Digby and Chips ignore Grumpy's warning and get trapped by the rising tide in what they think is a magical wishing cave.

episodes.name: Digby's Egg
episodes.overview: Digby adopts an egg with legs, believing that it's a dragon egg. He soon learns that the responsibility of his new pet is more than he expected.

episodes.name: The Dragon's Amulet
episodes.overview: Chips puts on a mystical amulet and grows wings. Digby wants his turn with the amulet, but Chips has become super-selfish and won't share.

episodes.name: All the Fun of the Hair
episodes.overview: Digby is jealous of his cousin Dougie's new moustache, but when he asks Fizzy to magic him some facial hair too, the spell goes awry.

episodes.name: A Very Bad Dragon
episodes.overview: When Digby thinks he sees a knight in shining armour and is in Applecross Wood, his attempts to prove that he is a good dragon do not really go to plan.

episodes.name: Fern Frenzy
episodes.overview: When Fizzy leaves her special fern in Digby's care, he soon has cause to regret neglecting to follow her careful instructions on how to look after it. When Florence the magic fern runs off, it causes havoc.

episodes.name: Moulting Season
episodes.overview: Digby Dragon and his friends get up to more adventures during the Moulting season.

episodes.name: Science vs. Magic
episodes.overview: When Digby crash-lands and breaks his mechanical wings, Fizzy and Grumpy compete to see who can best get Digby airborne again; Digby must get over his fear of turnips to make sure the right person wins the Applecross turnip-carving competition.

episodes.name: Grizel's Best Friend
episodes.overview: Grizel uses Fizzy's magic "double dust" to create a copy of herself -- a new best friend, but she soon learns that she's actually her own worst enemy; when Digby starts sneezing uncontrollably, he worries that he's become allergic to Chips.

episodes.name: A Waft of Chips
episodes.overview: Digby starts sneezing uncontrollably during a game of coneball with Chips and worries that he has become allergic to his friend. No matter what they try, they can't stop the sneezes. Will Chips have to leave Applecross Wood?

episodes.name: I, Grumpier
episodes.overview: Grumpy builds a robot as pernickety and obsessive as himself to help him with all his tasks. But the robot turns out to be more even more Grumpy than Grumpy and tries to take over Applecross.

episodes.name: Clear Out
episodes.overview: Digby is having a clear out, but parting with his old toys is harder than he expected. When Chips gives his old lava lamp to Grizel, he is specially upset. When Grizel refuses to return it, he sets out to steal it back Mission Impossible style.

episodes.name: Turnip Day
episodes.overview: Digby must overcome his fear of turnips to ensure that the right person wins a turnip-carving contest.
